content.detailedDescription: My stepfather witnessed 2 bright objects too high to be planes moving across the sky above new rochelle, ny. the objects were moving too fast for something that high up in the sky, where no planes go. the object looked to have been round in shape and moved from west to east one night and then another night north to south. the objects were seen at the exact same time 2 consecutive nights in new rochelle, then friday night while at my home in litchfield, ct my stepfather and mother saw the exact same thing moving in the skies.
content.summary: Star like object too high to be plane seen multiple nights by multiple people

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to raymond, which is south, then i took a left at an inter section and headed east. i looked in my rear view mirror, and saw the object. approximately 1/2 mile behind me to the west. i sped up and got to the place i was going to. i was stirred up a little bit. when i first noticed the object, it appeared to be a flame. it was flickering like a flame, or pulsating, and changing from one color to another. it stayed in one place. i turned north on a road, and didn't see it anymore.
content.summary: I was driving and south and turned left at an inter section, and i looked back and saw a pulsating changing fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
Location:  topsail island, north carolina.
date:  june 19th 2014.
time:  8:47 p.M..
distance from observer:  unknown.
distance from ground:  unknown.
weather conditions:  80% visibility in the direction of objects observed, denser clouds in the opposite direction (west).

this report should be viewed as an extension of the previous report i filed, regarding the previous nights's events (below).  i would recommend reading that report and watching the video before continuing with this one.

report:
http://mufoncms.Com/cgi-bin/report_handler.Pl?Req=view_long_desc&id=57146&rnd
video:
http://www.Mufoncms.Com/files/57146_submitter_file1__vid20140618210827212.Mp4

after the previous night's events, we observed increased military plane activity the following day, which included awacs planes and three ospreys, which all flew directly toward the area we saw the objects the previous night.  at 8:02 p.M., a military helicopter made a large circular sweep in the area of the objects.

the objects appeared at 8:47 p.M., and were in the same location as the previous report, and behaved in the same manner (with the exception of one splitting into two, and one ejecting another object).

the only noticeable difference was one object (identical to the others), which appeared to the south, out beyond the end of the jolly roger pier.  this object was not in the sky, but on the horizon where the water and the sky meet. 

at 9:19 p.M., less than ten minutes after the objects had 'stopped' for the night, four military helicopters flew over our house directly toward the ocean in the direction of the objects.  the group split, two turning north, and two turning south, simultaneously shutting off all of their lights.

for the next hour, four planes and an assortment of helicopters began making wide circles over our house and heading out toward the area of the objects.  military aircraft activity stopped around 10:30 p.M..

it's worth noting that each night of the occurrence, all military aircraft that flew to the area of the objects returned inland.  in other words, no military craft were in the area when the objects appeared.

attached are two videos, taken with a droid ultra phone.  these videos have not been doctored in any way, and no attempts have been made to 'clean up' the image quality.  please ignore the lights moving near the bottom of the image.  these were groups of beachcombers with flashlights.
content.summary: Orange glowing lights above atlantic ocean, followed by heavy military air traffic
content.locationName: Topsail Island, North Car, North Carolina

content.detailedDescription:
I was working a lake city ammunition plant in independence mo went i walked over to door that had a window in it. it is impossible to see out of the plant as there are no windows in it. i was just looking out side to see what the weather was like. it was a warm, sunny, day with large cumulus clouds floating around in the blue sky. all of a sudden i saw an acorn shaped ufo shoot out from one cloud and into another.  it was very shinny silver colored ufo and it was small in size. i think it was about 3-4 miles from the plant. i was looking to the west of the plant when i saw the ufo.
 
when i first saw it i began to wonder if i really did see a ufo. so i mentally said to the ufo, "okay if you are the real deal then show yourself to me again," right after i mentally said that to it, here came the ufo out of the cloud and it showed it's self for a few seconds again and then went into the next the cloud where i could not see it anymore.
  
i was kind of stunned that when i asked it to show it's self again that it did it. i stood there for a little while longer but never saw anything again. i really did feel that i had connected to with the ufo mentally.
content.summary: Viewed acorn shaped ufo and mentally connected with it.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately around 11:00 am this morning ( 6-21-2014 ) i was coming out of the starbucks at 257 south la cienega in beverly hills california. something caught my eye at approximately 1 o���clock in the sky of a bright white light that was very noticeable and it was hovering above the telephone pole and lines for about 10 mins at an extreme distance. i went inside and asked a few people to come out and see if they could notice what i was looking at.  two of the employees came out with two female customer and we all watched the ufo hover for quite some time then all of a sudden it went straight up at a speed that i have never seen before. everyone left and i stated around for a few minutes in awe still looking for that object and then all of a sudden behind me as i was looking up i noticed two more of them and tried to take photos from my samsung  smart phone but they were way to high to get a clear photo all i could see in the image was blue sky. i continued to watch them for about 20 more moments and they just sat there and then went straight up and vanished. the entire time this was going on you could see commercial airlines flying north and south. the objects at this time were very high in the sky and there is no doubt in my mind and the workers at starbucks  and myself know what we witnessed. i do not want to give my name but i work for a very respected swat team in the area...
content.summary: Coming out of starbucks coffe house something caught my eye

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 31, 2014 i was driving south on taft ave. in loveland, colorado at approximately 9:10 p.M. and noticed 3 orange colored lights, shaped like a football, floating in the southern sky in front of me. they were the only lights in the sky, other than some dim stars. at first i didn't think much about it, i thought it was someone sending a few of those lantern things with the bag and candle up into the sky. then as i kept watching they appeared to change directions, like 180 degrees but the other ones would go in different directions at different speeds. it was like they were dancing with each other never changing color or intensity or shape. there was very little or no wind that night and no candle bags are going to act like that. i continued on watching them as i drove but i couldn't really pull over to watch them better. as the minutes went on one of them just disappeared or faded away. then in a short time the other 2 were gone. never saw them or anything after.
content.summary: I was driving my car down the street heading south and noticed 3 orange colored lights that seemed to glow. they were kind of football shaped and seemed to kind of dance with each other.

content.detailedDescription:
I and three of my colleagues were at the time analyzing data to determine
where gas was leaking in rural housing areas. at about 11 pm our equipment
went out...Total loss of power,we got out of the van to trace all possibilities of power failure...I caught something out of corner of my eye
moving slowly across the area about 500 feet up 700 feet away.There was a light streaming in on us like a search light then it retracted back into craft as though some sort of pulley retracted.The craft descended  to about
300 feet, hovered roughly 4 minutes then separated into three individual bodies.I do recall one of the crafts omitting a glow off the surface...Looked like   dark green   bordering black.The crafts took off in separate directions and all power came back on.I reported it to my supervisor...She determined that i am too keep all of this to myself not to go any further with this  nor to tell anyone,explain to anyone and not  to submit to anyone or group of this siting.Well i am off duty and on my time........So there it is.The other two never made mention of anything,nothing....And choose not to work with me if at all possible.I am a believer      nothing can and will  deny what   we saw.
content.summary: Triangle within a triangle within triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was living in marble falls texas area when it started in 2012. several ufos nightly making a circle formation around my home. i keep moving and they do as well. i am use to it but i finally got photos. i have many people who have witnessed them around me. the government is always around as well. if you realky want a ufo story contact me.
content.summary: Have witnessed them for almost two years. i have moved several times around texas and they all follow. they are w me every night.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 2, 2014 my family was camping at dixie national forest, te-ah
campground site #37,navajo lake, united states.  we had set down for the evening, it was about 10:30 pm the sky was clear, it was about 50 degrees.  my husband went down to our camper, my friend ginger was setting next to me.  i just looked up and out over the lake when this happens:

   space opened (like a slit) 
   this budding flower came out
   then bam, the flower bloomed like a pom-pom.
   the flower glowed, it had yellow white maybe even orange
   next the inside of this flower came out,  
   and as it did the shape now was a ball
   as it glowed it went whoosh to the north the stopped and went east.
   then it zigged and zagged went north, east, then north.
   and it went out of view over the horizon. 

the next morning june 3, 2014 something happened:

we were out drinking coffee and you could hear the jets coming in over,or to the south of us. it was loud and we actually thought the jet
was crashing on or near to us. we jumped and actually ran toward this
crashing sound to see if we could help.  however what i saw was a very
up close and personal view of an f-15 fully loaded with bombs and other stuff on the wings, it was about 300 feet above us. it was very close.
i could see the pilot's face, side view. three other f-15's flew over
next and all flew over the lake to the north east.

we have been camping there for 6-7 years and never have we seen
any military aircraft.

in brief:

we were camping, the fire was great and i just looked up. i thought
this was really unexplainable and wow it really looked like a
flower coming thru a tear in space and went from bud to full bloom.
then the inside came out and turned the flower into a huge ball
of glowing i do not know what. all of this took around three minutes
and in this period it went north stopped went left stopped then
zigged after all of this is just west north. this whole thing really
freaked me out.

this is my story of the event happened. my husband and ginger
will follow up with theirs.  once again: wow
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The sky opened up like a slit & a flower blooming emerged, then bam, the flower bloomed into this huge glowing yellow & white flower.  next the inside came out and the whole thing went left, stop left stop up right then zoom left.

content.detailedDescription: See attached file
content.summary: See attached file

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in my back garden taking a sequence of photographs of a nest of starlings being fed, did not notice anything untoward until reviewing photographs later in the house and spotted object in background. possibly a balloon but showed up very fast as previous photograph was one second earlier with nothing showing, then object appears and is gone in sequential photographs. i am sending photograph attached in the hope that you can identify it.
content.summary: Showed up on a photograph

content.detailedDescription: Well this event happened last year but i found out recently about the mufon website to report sightings. i felt it is important to report this sighting eventhough it happened a year ago. i was working in a restaurant with indoor and outdoor seating. around 8 pm i was working in the indoor portion of the restaurant but i stepped to the outside portion of restaurant to get a drink of water. the patio or outdoor area was full of people. when i looked around to notice the people outside i saw to the south three pulsating purple/violet swirling lights decending from the sky. it descended rather rapidly because within seconds it came from a few thousand feet to hovering about a hundred feet to the parallel building to the restaurant  at first i was confused about what i was seeing but once i focused myself onto the object it was just about hovering to the building parallel next to the restaurant. i was suprised nobody else was watching what i was witnessing. the object had the three pulsating violet/purple lights and was simply hovering over the building which is about 3 stories high. i would say the object was about70 - 100 feet above the building. i didnt notice the outside shape of the object because it seemed as if it was invisible. my opinion was the object was either triangle shape because of the three pulsating lights rotating clockwise. there was about 50-70 feet in between each light. the object was moving north and i decided to watch the object from the opposite side of restaurant. to do this i would have to go back into the restaurant and out into the street. unfortunately that night i had only one table and of course they were very needy. because of them i was not able to come around the building where the restaurant is and witness the object hovering to the north. about twenty minutes later i did exit the restaurant from the front of building but by then the object was gone. hard to tell if it was alien or military, but the way it descended and then hovered within a matter of seconds, i believe it was definately not domestic.I have seen a few strange objects in my lifetime, this was the most recent. just wanted to share. thanks for your time and keep up the great work!! we are obviously not alone!
content.summary: Saw craft descending from south with three swirling purple lights rotating clockwise in a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
Hier ist der brief: auch auf das hat das ufo reagiert!
_________________________________________________________________________

brief an die au��erirdischen wesen

ich bin so traurig :(  :(  :(  :(  :(  :(  :(  :(  :(  :(  :(

hallo ihr lieben da oben!

wie geht es euch? es tut mir so leid��� ihr kommt von so weit hier her. einen sehr langen weg der entwicklung musstet ihr gehen, bis ihr endlich so weit wart um zu uns zu kommen und um freunde im universum suchen zu d��rfen, in der unendlichkeit!

das universum ist so kalt, so unendlich und so lebensfeindlich. das leben braucht sehr lange zeit, bis es soweit entwickelt ist, dass sich das bewusstsein und noch l��nger bis sich das globale bewusstsein auspr��gt - das globale f��hlen ��� denken und handeln.

ihr seid schon so weit, aber wir noch nicht. viel zu unterschiedliche entwicklungsstadien haben unsere staaten und wir menschen selbst. erst jetzt dank der vernetzung ��� dem internet, fangen wir an uns mehr zu kennen und zu verstehen. es fehlt uns noch die globale bildung, damit sich kein menschenleben missbrauchen l��sst f��r die kriege und egoismus und bis jeder verstanden hat, dass wir alle zusammen geh��ren, dass man nur zusammen alle probleme l��sen kann. 

so gerne w��rde ich euch die hand geben und umarmen. ich kann mich auf den boden setzen, solltet ihr kleiner sein, damit ihr euch sicher f��hlt. ich w��rde euch so gerne sagen wie froh ich bin, dass ihr die unlebendige materie besiegt und den langen weg zu uns ��berwunden habt. es ist so sch��n euch wahrzunehmen! das leben ist etwas ganz besonderes und ich freue mich sehr, dass es euch gibt. wir sind nicht alleine! das zu wissen ist das sch��nste geschenk, gleich nach meinen kindern!  danke! 

ich w��rde euch so gerne besch��tzen und sagen, dass euch nichts passiert, solltet ihr bei uns landen. aber viele menschen wissen nicht einmal, dass es euch gibt. und ich wei�� nicht, wie die menschen dann reagieren werden. es tut mir so leid���

ich hoffe sehr, ich werde euch noch irgendwann pers��nlich kennen lernen d��rfen, bevor ich als alte frau sterbe. man lebt nicht ewig und das leben ist so kurz. passt auf euch auf und richtet bitte meine herzlichen gr����e an eure zivilisation und nicht nur von mir, auch von meinen zwei s��hnen und ich bin mir sicher auch von der ganze erde!

herzliche gr����e

rena ��� der mensch 
____________________________________________________________________

auf diesen brief hat das ufo sofort reagiert mit  nah flug  und mit lichtsignalen!
content.summary: Kommunikation - reaktion auf mein brief

content.detailedDescription: I had invited some friends out for a sunday drive and by nightfall we ended up near san diego.We were lucky enough to get a camping spot and really lucky that i had a small tent in the trunk of my car. so the four of us (including myself)are just talking and laughing and having a few beer's not paying much attention to the hardcore party-goers that had filled the park to it's limit. my sitting position was facing north and what happened next just blew me away.A flash of light so bright and a sound almost like that of a shutter on a camera came right into the tent!I jumped up and was out the tent in seconds. i just stood there dumbfounded because i expected to see kids running off or maybe a feww guys trying to get our attention. but there was nothing.And there was really no place to hide.So back into the tent.No big deal. no sooner had i sat down when it happend again!This time my friend flew out that tent right behind me. and the both of us just standing there looking at each other and getting the creepiest feeling. so back inside we go and we are questioning each other as to what is going on? so in total it flashed 3 times.And it was as if someone was right up next to the tent just inches away. by morning all was forgotten.We headed on home. the following weekend the four of us ended up at my house and we were sitting on a picnic table all facing south.It was just getting dark when from behind us(that would be north)it was a flash and that sound that was like the shutter on a camera.We turned around so fast and our jaws just dropped.Clear sky,no planes,no pranksters,no nothing!It had tracked our location even after a week. but that's not the end of it.No one believed us.We had just made this crazy story up. they would soon be in for a surprise. went to a party and most everyone was there and it may have been a few weeks later. a group of us in the kitchen just socializing when out of nowhere this flash came in through the window and lit up the entire apartment.That was more than 30 years ago and to this day i still have no idea what it could have been. after all that time i just hope they don't show up at my front door. i've looked online trying to find someone else who may have experienced such an event but no such luck.
content.summary: The 4 of us sitting in our little pup tent at a state beach when a flash of light seemed to be right up next to our tent. what is really disturbing is that it had somehow tracked us back to our homes some 60 miles away and a week later.

content.detailedDescription: outside standing on my deck at about 10:15p.M.  i saw what at first was a star but seemed different from the rest of the stars.  i got my bino's  and looked at the object thru them i could see different blinking lights, blue red green orange and white or yellow.  no pattern to them and they on the object they seemed to move around on it at times.  i looked around the sky and found several more objects that appeared to look like the first.  i was in the military and have lived close to shaw air force base most of my life.  what i saw was not an airplane or any helicopter that i know of.  i have observed these objects every night for the past week have tired to take photo's but they are too distance for my camera's to make out.  they appear to slowly drift across the sky. i don't know how long they last but one night i saw them at 3 a.M.  they will most likely be back tonight, and i will continue to watch for them.  i don't know what they are.  and i wish that i had better camera's with which too take some good photo's.
content.summary: For the past week have observed several objects with blinking lights  none appear to move

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room doing basically nothing when i looked out of the window to my room at what i thought was a plane or helicopter.  the light wasn't blinking like an aircraft's light would.  it almost looked like it was on fire, which led me to think i may have been looking at a meteor of some sort.  i went outside to get a closer look.  it travelled from southwest to northwest at a constant velocity before dimming, flickering and going out completely.  the event didn't have any profound effects on me emotionally or physically before or after the event, other than the fact that i had thought it was very peculiar.
content.summary: I watched a small, starlike light travel across the sky before flickering and going out

content.detailedDescription:
The most interesting part of this whole contact experience was that just prior to my husband going to have a smoke outside and seeing this craft at eye level, he and i had just had a brief exchange /squabble about et's. ironically or not, below are the details of our discussion just minutes before our sighting. in a nutshell, i am a huge, huge fan of dr. steven greer- the founder and father of the disclosure project movement and the awesome sirius film documentary. i had recently downloaded his et contact app on my cell phone. i had performed the meditations using dr. greer���s ce-5 (close encounter of the 5th kind) app to vector an etv (extraterrestrial vehicle) to our location for several hours earlier in the day. i was now in our bedroom listening to a podcast with dr. greer explaining the details of his near death experience and i paused the podcast to find my husband in our living room, to tell him about it. i told my husband, unsolicited of course, that i too, like dr. steven greer, believe that when we die, we go to where we are, consciously and cosmically. so, i was nagging my husband for the 100th time, that i wanted him to increase his conscious awareness, start meditating immediately because i was now four years ahead of him in learning to do so, that he needed to quit smoking yesterday and be at a higher level of consciousness today, so that by the time we both die, we might have the chance to know each again in another dimension, pending that he cultivate his cosmic awareness. he was not very receptive to my thoughts, especially since i had made him listen to recordings that had come out of a crop circle, known as "crop circle tones" via dr. steven greer���s contact app, earlier in the day. so after lecturing him, i walked back to our bedroom to resume my podcast with dr. steven greer and my husband walked outside and into another dimension. below are the details and our four videos of this sighting attached. the third and fourth videos are the best of the etv. thank you et and thank you to the most cosmically conscious man on our planet, dr. steven m. greer, to whom we will be forever most humbly grateful. 

at approximately 8:00 pm, my husband went outside our front door to smoke a cigarette, after the run in with me above, where i lectured him about et's and his needing to learn to meditate. he came running back in the house screaming my name, yelling, "come outside!!!!!" he was running so hard through our house, his hands smacking the walls, as he was running down the main hallway, that he was shaking the house. i actually thought we were possibly having a small earthquake. i yelled back at him, "hold on!" before i could even get outside, he came back inside again absolutely screaming, for me and my son to ���hurry up!��� my son and i go outside and see at eye level, why he was so excited. a brilliant, absolutely gorgeous, sphere was at tree top level, directly across the street from our home, hovering directly over our neighbor's large pine tree. it turned colors from an aqua/neon blue, to a cobalt blue and a bright red, as it was spinning in a counter clockwise fashion. it was so freaking awesome there are simply no words. after capturing our full attention, the air show began. the maneuvering capability of this light ship was beyond all comprehension. it would arch its flight path in a "c" shape jumping or hopping right over the top of the pine tree, hopping back and forth, over the top of the tree with ease and back again. it would stop about 50' from the left side of the tree top, hover, then free fall to below the tree line, then ascend straight up faster they anything you could ever see at six flaggs, hover again, go behind the tree, jump over the tree, free fall halfway, stop in midair, free fall again, then ascend straight up, hover and this went on and on and on and on. this lasted for approximately thirty minutes. in fact, my husband had the time to go back inside to find his camera, a nikon d3100, then he scrambled to find the right camera lens, as he run inside and outside about changing lens, but he was successful in videotaping the light ship. the ship remained with us until our teenage neighbor and his companion arrived by car at their home, where the action was taking place right over their heads. as they drove up, they could clearly see the three of us standing in our driveway, excited and my husband with a camera in his hand filming the sky above their home. they naturally crossed the street and walked into our driveway to see what we were doing and to see what we were looking at. i told them as they approached, not to be afraid and then my husband yelled out at them, that it was a ufo and i think they got a little scared as they turned around to look at it. it was at this point that the ship seemed too dematerialized to our naked eye, but on the fourth video attached, what you can see that it actually did, was to take off so fast, going to the lower left, that we couldn't see this at all, its speed was so quick and fast. i believe it left us because our teenage neighbors were afraid and to avoid causing anyone, any emotional duress whatsoever, they will remove themselves because this is how truly loving they are. i believe, rather, i know with 100 percent certainty, that this was a completely peaceful contact experience and the "et's" are so kind in fact, i even tried to tell the teens to not be afraid but the ship would not rematerialized in their presence. we had to show them the video so they would not think we were all crazy. please excuse my husband's profanity in the videos, as he was so frenzied and frantic to film this sighting, that we can now both laugh at his reaction. i, on the other hand, was talking to the craft, thanking it for this awesome experience, asking it if we could photograph it, etc., and my husband clearly wanted me to "shut up!" our conversation on the audio is hilarious. the experience and sighting left me so incredibly happy for hours. while watching it live, i felt like i could predict its next movements. my husband would say, "it's gone." i found myself responding, "no it's not, it is going to come out from behind the tree and drop straight down" and it would. i seriously felt like i was somehow communicating with it and could direct my husband where to point his camera next to try to capture this fast moving object again and again. it was one of the best moments of all of our lives and i wish this same experience for all of humanity. someone should nominate dr. steven m. greer for the nobel peace prize as the preeminent genius of the 20th and 21st centuries and beyond. we wish everyone peace, blessings and universal happiness and freedom to all our members of the human family.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: vectored ufo / etv using dr. steven m. greer's contact app using his ce-5 (close encounter of the 5th kind) initiative - awesome light ship - four videos

Months before my brother saw the ufo,it was a clear night i was waiting for my friend at a bus stop i noticed a giant ship it lande near a feild .I was paralyazed for a while then i went thereto check it out .Then the door open and i went in .
Months before my brother saw the ufo,it was a clear night i was waiting for my friean at a bus stop i noticed a giant wp

I was waiting at a bus stop then i heard a sound ot sounded like a jet i thought i was a jet it landed 7 feet away at a feild and i was like wtf!!!!.I didnt lose sight of it i went in it.Thete was advaced tech,weapons,vehicles,suits and ships .

content.detailedDescription:
Ich habe 10 ufo sichtungen 

gesehen. 1. ufo sichtung im jahr 1986. kugel mit laser und scheinwerfer. wir haben gesehen von wo her es kam aus dem all und wohin es wieder zur��ck flog.

weitere 9 sichtungen haben in deutschland 2014 statt gefunden.

bei den sichtungen kam es zur der kommunikation zwischen mensch und au��erirdischen wesen durch das internet und ufo licht und erscheinung. 

es war keine hohe kommunikation,  aber es k��nnte der anfang sein.

das alles zu schreiben w��re zu viel. alles habe ich im blog beschrieben. keine ahnung wie ich es zu euch schicken soll. es ist zu viel!
hier datum der veranstaltung:
19.05.1986, tschech. rep., kugel, in der nacht.
09.01.2014 in sindelfingen, zylinder, reaktion auf mein brief an polizei bremen, wegen ufo over bremen, am tag.
11.03.2014, in sindelfingen, triangel - reaktion auf mein fotoblitz, 135 grad richtung ��nderung, flug dann an mir vorbei, sehr nah, fr��h abend.
04.06.2014 - in sindelfingen, stange vertikal, flug vertikal
06.06.2014, in sindelfingen, zigarre, morgens
07.06.2014,
 sindelfingen in der nacht, ufo mit lichtschweif, aufgetaucht genau in der mitte meiner sicht
10.06.2014, in sindelfingen, ein stern pl��tzlich da, sehr nah meiner wohnung
13.06.2014, sindelfingen, ein stern der aufleuchtete, in der mitte meiner sicht. diese sichtung habe ich wegen zu wenig informationen in meinem blog kritisiert. n��chsten tag hat das ufo drauf reagiert!
15.04.2014, ufo begr����te mich, hat meine taschenlampe - licht imitiert,  auch die gesvhwindigkeit. hat 2 mal den r��ckgang angeschaltet. dann habe ich brieg an die au��erirdische wesen geschrieben. kurze zeit, nach dem ich den brief in meinem blog online stellte, flog das ufo an meinem haus vorbei sehr nah und hat mit den gleichen scheinwerfer (nicht in die flugrichtung)sich bedankt und sehr wahrscheinlich auch verabschiedet.
content.summary: Kommunikation zwischen mensch und außerirdischen wesen

content.detailedDescription: I was standing watching the stars as it was a very clear night,when i noticed a very bright star only slightly bigger.I was trying to work out if it could be a satalite of something when it seemed to come toward my position slightly then accelerated south very fast,and was gone in about 1 second.I stood and stared as it left me very shocked.Needless to say it still leaves me awe struck and would like to find out what it could have been.
content.summary: Verry bright star only larger

content.detailedDescription:
2008 april, 20:15,
 
2nd floor, top of the stairs, filling / empting the washing machine.
a moment of panic   -  step by step

from a atic window - saw a star blinking. 
blinking green orange (wierd)
first used a meade etx-90 telescope on a tripod.
at an akward angle, couldn't see tru it.
put videocam on the tripod.
zooming in and........ heart rate shoots up!
it's not a star !
low bat !! no tape !!
quick, find cord and tape !!
found it and the object was stil there but moved a bit.
tape was full, just a few minutes left !!
pressed rec

wow! this is for real! what a feeling...A real sighting...
it's a, thing, a slow moving thing, high up in the sky.

taking pictures and recording on tape.
zooming in and out.
used my cellphone as a reverence for the dot in the distance.
out of tape- indicator flaching all that time !
it starts rewinding and the object moved some more.
quick stop rewinding ! press rec again.
a stupit thing to do, as i taped-over most of it!!

truly a moment of panic.
ended up with :
two photos made at 20:19 and two at 20:26
just 40 sec of good video made at 20: 25
by 20:37 the object was gone.


later i gave my footage to the dutch ufo website niburu.Nl. they uploaded it on youtube and compared it with john lenard walson.
content.summary: Flashing star turns out to be solid object. couldn't see true telescope(shaky from nerves) but saw it on camera display. (sony dcr-hc-96)

content.detailedDescription:
The most interesting part of this whole contact experience was that just prior to my husband going to have a smoke outside and seeing this craft at eye level, he and i had just had a brief exchange /squabble about et's. ironically or not, below are the details of our discussion just minutes before our sighting. in a nutshell, i am a huge, huge fan of dr. steven greer- the founder and father of the disclosure project movement and the awesome sirius film documentary. i had recently downloaded his et contact app on my cell phone. i had performed the meditations using dr. greer���s ce-5 (close encounter of the 5th kind) app to vector an etv (extraterrestrial vehicle) to our location for several hours earlier in the day. i was now in our bedroom listening to a podcast with dr. greer explaining the details of his near death experience and i paused the podcast to find my husband in our living room, to tell him about it. i told my husband, unsolicited of course, that i too, like dr. steven greer, believe that when we die, we go to where we are, consciously and cosmically. so, i was nagging my husband for the 100th time, that i wanted him to increase his conscious awareness, start meditating immediately because i was now four years ahead of him in learning to do so, that he needed to quit smoking yesterday and be at a higher level of consciousness today, so that by the time we both die, we might have the chance to know each again in another dimension, pending that he cultivate his cosmic awareness. he was not very receptive to my thoughts, especially since i had made him listen to recordings that had come out of a crop circle, known as "crop circle tones" via dr. steven greer���s contact app, earlier in the day.  so after lecturing him, i walked back to our bedroom to resume my podcast with dr. steven greer and my husband walked outside and into another dimension. below are the details and our four videos of this sighting attached. the third and fourth videos are the best of the etv. thank you et and thank you to the most cosmically conscious man on our planet, dr. steven m. greer, to whom we will be forever most humbly grateful. 

at approximately 8:00 pm, my husband went outside our front door to smoke a cigarette, after the run in with me above, where i lectured him about et's and his needing to learn to meditate. he came running back in the house screaming my name, yelling, "come outside!!!!!" he was running so hard through our house, his hands smacking the walls, as he was running down the main hallway, that he was shaking the house. i actually thought we were possibly having a small earthquake. i yelled back at him, "hold on!" before i could even get outside, he came back inside again absolutely screaming, for me and my son to ���hurry up!��� my son and i go outside and see at eye level, why he was so excited. a brilliant, absolutely gorgeous, sphere was at tree top level, directly across the street from our home, hovering directly over our neighbor's large pine tree. it turned colors from an aqua/neon blue, to a cobalt blue and a bright red, as it was spinning in a counter clockwise fashion. it was so freaking awesome there are simply no words. after capturing our full attention, the air show began. the maneuvering capability of this light ship was beyond all comprehension. it would arch its flight path in a "c" shape jumping or hopping right over the top of the pine tree, hopping back and forth, over the top of the tree with ease and back again. it would stop about 50' from the left side of the tree top, hover, then free fall to below the tree line, then ascend straight up faster they anything you could ever see at six flaggs, hover again, go behind the tree, jump over the tree, free fall halfway, stop in midair, free fall again, then ascend straight up, hover and this went on and on and on and on. this lasted for approximately thirty minutes. in fact, my husband had the time to go back inside to find his camera, a nikon d3100, then he scrambled to find the right camera lens, as he run inside and outside about changing lens, but he was successful in videotaping the light ship. the ship remained with us until our teenage neighbor and his companion arrived by car at their home, where the action was taking place right over their heads. as they drove up, they could clearly see the three of us standing in our driveway, excited and my husband with a camera in his hand filming the sky above their home. they naturally crossed the street and walked into our driveway to see what we were doing and to see what we were looking at. i told them as they approached, not to be afraid and then my husband yelled out at them, that it was a ufo and i think they got a little scared as they turned around to look at it. it was at this point that the ship seemed to dematerialized to our naked eye, but on the fourth video attached, what you can see that it actually did, was to take off so fast, going to the lower left, that we couldn't see this at all, its speed was so quick and fast. i believe it left us because our teenage neighbors were afraid and to avoid causing anyone, any emotional duress whatsoever, they will remove themselves because this is how truly loving they are. i believe, rather, i know with 100 percent certainty, that this was a completely peaceful contact experience and the "et's" are so kind in fact, i even tried to tell the teens to not be afraid but the ship would not rematerialized in their presence. we had to show them the video so they would not think we were all crazy. please excuse my husband's profanity in the videos, as he was so frenzied and frantic to film this sighting, that we can now both laugh at his reaction. i, on the other hand, was talking to the craft, thanking it for this awesome experience, asking it if we could photograph it, etc., and my husband clearly wanted me to "shut up!" our conversation on the audio is hilarious. the experience and sighting left me so incredibly happy for hours. while watching it live, i felt like i could predict its next movements. my husband would say, "it's gone." i found myself responding, "no it's not, it is going to come out from behind the tree and drop straight down" and it would. i seriously felt like i was somehow communicating with it and could direct my husband where to point his camera next to try to capture this fast moving object again and again. it was one of the best moments of all of our lives and i wish this same experience for all of humanity. someone should nominate dr. steven m. greer for the nobel peace prize as the preeminent genius of the 20th and 21st centuries and beyond. we wish everyone peace, blessings and universal happiness and freedom to all our members of the human family.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Vectored ufo or etv using dr. steven m. greer's contact app using his ce-5 (close encouter of the 5th kind) iniitiative - awesome light ship - four videos

content.detailedDescription:
1. chestnut ridge park / longboarding
2. my friend signaled me to come over after seeing the object
3. a blimp that just so happened to be rotating clockwise
4. it just looked like a cylinder that was in the air rotating clockwise, very slowly heading east
5. a state of total awe and wonderment
6. it slowly drifted away from the treeline
content.summary: I could not understand what this thing was. something so high up could not be rotating so slowly to keep the altitude

content.detailedDescription: This is the event that leave no doubt. four disks, orangeish/red coming right at us me and my wife as we were leaving the walmart in pico rivera california. they were traveling northwest until they were almost directly above us. then turned north. one turned of it's lights and i could actually see it better.  a true, "flying saucer" other witnesses stopped and watched them also. they came within only a few hundred feet from us as they turned north. they couldn't have been but 2 to 200 feet from me. this is now the third time i have witnessed an event since last october. just witnessed an event a couple of weeks ago that i reported here. they are really messing with the incoming airline traffic into lax. air traffic knew about this. one plane had to turn sharply, the rest waited and there was a long lag in time before they let another airliner back into that flight path. i am an avid aviation enthusiast that knows aircraft. these are not ours! not helicopters, not airplanes, but alien craft! what is going on? why are they becoming so bold?
content.summary: Four disc orange/red discs going nw. unstable directions. all turned north. one turned off lights, could see it clearly

content.detailedDescription: I have been using a strobe light and mental projection to try to get them to send me a ufo to look at and after just a few weeks one appeared on tuesday june 17 at 1 am flying west to east about a mile away for about a minute then faded slowly to a dull red after flying for about 1-2 miles.  i asked them in my mind if it would not be too much to ask that they send another one the next night so my wife could see it.  wed. june 18 at 1:47 am i saw it coming about a mile away to the west moving eastbound aprox. at a height of 200 yards.  it was an orange fireball type with no actual flames, just semi-transparent and glowing.  i have no video but it is exactly the type shown in another video "six orange ufo fireball phenomenon 2013."  it passed my house and at a radius of about 200 yards and about that high then faded slowly out to a dull red color then slowly disappeared.  i know that they had given me and my wife (whom i had called to come see it) a special show, and i thanked them.  i hope to see more!
content.summary: Non-pulsating orange orb semi-translucent fireball type ship

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard at 11:30 pm enjoying a cigarette before bed while looking up at the stars. to the north at approximately 45 degrees from my location, one star caught my attention. it appeared still at first glance but noticed that it was getting brighter and moving away from me. it then disappeared, a split second it reappeared about inch or two to the left and continued heading north. i got up to tell my wife who was inside but as i stood, it disappeared again.  i stopped walking and continued looking for it's return. it appeared again another one to two inches to the left of it's last exit point and continued traveling north until it reached outside of my view of the horizon. 

i frequently see many satellites traverse the sky from my backyard. this was similar but different due to the continuously adjusting line of travel. the light was slightly brighter than a satellite and did have a trail like a small shooting star.
content.summary: Bounced in and out of atmosphere and re entered off of exit path but always heading north

content.detailedDescription:
Please  see  the attached enlarge.  they had windows. light came thought the window. 
we took pictures with i-phone.
content.summary: They moved from right to left for 3sec.

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling from westlock alberta to edmonton on the morning of june 8, 2014.  i was taking several random pics along the way of the flat landscape and farm land with my cell phone.  my last photo turned out completely white and my phone would not work for about an hour after the incident.  upon reviewing the photos once i was at home, i noticed that in one photo there was a distinct orb in the photo, another had a faint object in the air to the east, and one more photo had a distinct object either hovering or moving in the western sky above the morinville hutterite colony.  i did not see these objects in the sky when i was travelling there but could only see them in the photos later.
content.summary: Travelling in vehilce taking randon pics, discovered object in pic later at home
